pkgmetadata.longdescription: Project Code - Nonparametric Bayes // Basic implementation of a Gibbs sampler for a Chinese Restaurant Process along with some visual aids to help understand how the sampling works. This is developed as part of a postgraduate school project for an Advanced Bayesian Nonparametric course. It is inspired by Tamara Broderick's presentation on Nonparametric Bayesian statistics given at the Simons institute.
